content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 free pattern on blog 2 **the adriene bandana** **difficulty** beginner **materials** yarn art jeans plus 100gr 55% cotton 45% pac 160 mt 175yards color 83 for this sample i used 0 5 skein hook us size h-8 5 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **sizes** this sample is 13 in length without straps and 9 height **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet st = stitch double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch **notes** the pattern is worked with one full square and two half squares chain 3 at the beginning of the row does count as a stitch i used a blended cotton yarn you can use any weight #4 yarn you can work this pattern with one color or multiple as you wish stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299 2 https //sandrastitches com/flower-granny-crochet-bandana-adriene/
